Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 88th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Carey Secrest (COL)...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 7/20/2016...
Injured on 8/22/2016 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2016, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2017, hitting .519 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Colorado on 9/8/2017...
Sets a new season AL-Record for RBI with 115 on 9/20/2017...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/11/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $13,000,000 per year...
